languages.text: "С-сегодня мы с-скорбим об ушедш-ших — сынах и дочерях, братьях и с-сестрах, родителях и возлюбленных, чьи души забрал ветер..."

traits.locale_text: "С-сегодня мы с-скорбим об ушедш-ших — сынах и дочерях, братьях и с-сестрах, родителях и возлюбленных, чьи души забрал ветер..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: "Today we mourn those we've losst, our sssons and daughters and brothers and sssisters and parents and lovers whose sssouls the wind took..."
languages.original_text: "С-сегодня мы с-скорбим об ушедш-ших — сынах и дочерях, братьях и с-сестрах, родителях и возлюбленных, чьи души забрал ветер..."

traits.locale_text: "Today we mourn those we've losst, our s-sons and daughters and brothers and s-sisters and parents and lovers whose s-souls the wind took..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

traits.locale_text: "Today we mourn those we've losst, our s-sons and daughters and brothers and s-sisters and parents and lovers whose s-souls the wind took..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

traits.locale_text: "Today we mourn those we've losst, our sssons and daughters and brothers and sssisters and parents and lovers whose sssouls the wind took..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

traits.locale_text: "Today we mourn those we've losst, our sssons and daughters and brothers and sssisters and parents and lovers whose sssouls the wind took..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

traits.locale_text: "Today we mourn those we've losst, our sssons and daughters and brothers and sssisters and parents and lovers whose sssouls the wind took..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: «Hoy lloramosss a los que hemos perdido, nuessstros hijosss e hijasss y hermanosss y padresss y amantesss cuyasss almasss ssse llevó el viento...».
languages.original_text: "Today we mourn those we've losst, our sssons and daughters and brothers and sssisters and parents and lovers whose sssouls the wind took..."

traits.locale_text: «Hoy lloramosss a los que hemos perdido, nuessstros hijosss e hijasss y hermanosss y padresss y amantesss cuyasss almasss ssse llevó el viento...».
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: 「今日、我々は失った者たちを悼む。風に魂を奪われた息子や娘たち、兄弟や姉妹たち、親や恋人たちを…」
languages.original_text: "Today we mourn those we've losst, our sssons and daughters and brothers and sssisters and parents and lovers whose sssouls the wind took..."

traits.locale_text: 「今日、我々は失った者たちを悼む。風に魂を奪われた息子や娘たち、兄弟や姉妹たち、親や恋人たちを…」
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: “今天，我们在此哀悼那些离我们而去的人。我们的儿子、女儿、兄弟、姐妹、父母、爱人，他们的灵魂随风而去……”
languages.original_text: "Today we mourn those we've losst, our sssons and daughters and brothers and sssisters and parents and lovers whose sssouls the wind took..."

traits.locale_text: “今天，我们在此哀悼那些离我们而去的人。我们的儿子、女儿、兄弟、姐妹、父母、爱人，他们的灵魂随风而去……”
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: « Aujourd'hui, nous pleurons ceux que nous avons perdus, nos fils et nos filles, nos frères et nos sœurs, nos parents et nos amants dont les âmes ont été emportées par le vent... »
languages.original_text: "Today we mourn those we've losst, our sssons and daughters and brothers and sssisters and parents and lovers whose sssouls the wind took..."

traits.locale_text: « Aujourd'hui, nous pleurons ceux que nous avons perdus, nos fils et nos filles, nos frères et nos sœurs, nos parents et nos amants dont les âmes ont été emportées par le vent... »
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: "Heute trauern wir um alle Verlorenen, um unsere Sssöhne und Töchter, Brüder und Ssschwestern, Eltern und Geliebten – um alle Ssseelen, die der Wind davongetragen hat ..."
languages.original_text: "Today we mourn those we've losst, our sssons and daughters and brothers and sssisters and parents and lovers whose sssouls the wind took..."

traits.locale_text: "Heute trauern wir um alle Verlorenen, um unsere Sssöhne und Töchter, Brüder und Ssschwestern, Eltern und Geliebten – um alle Ssseelen, die der Wind davongetragen hat ..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: "Bugün kaybettiklerimizin yasssını tutuyoruz. Ruhları rüzgâra kapılıp giden oğullarımız ve kızlarımız, kardeşşşlerimiz, anne babalarımız ve sssevgililerimiz..."
languages.original_text: "Today we mourn those we've losst, our sssons and daughters and brothers and sssisters and parents and lovers whose sssouls the wind took..."

traits.locale_text: "Bugün kaybettiklerimizin yasssını tutuyoruz. Ruhları rüzgâra kapılıp giden oğullarımız ve kızlarımız, erkek kardeşşşlerimiz ve kız kardeşşlerimiz, ebeveynlerimiz ve sssevgililerimiz..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01
